content: Rent Condominium Investments Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Oct 2018I have just got a property in Malaysia with a good guarantee rental returns. Do I need to pay tax in Singapore for the rental amount?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Leong Wen Fong, Economics and Management at University of LondonLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 12 Nov 2018My mum owns property in Malaysia, but I don't think she pays tax in SG for it, so in short I don't think so!However, I believe that Malaysia does place a heavy tax on Singaporeans owning porperty in Malaysia. Again, not sure of the exact figures, but because of this, my mother prefers to sell the property when she is older instead of passing it on to us.0 comments1
